Articles.Content: Just wondering if there will ever be any MODS available  on the PS4.

I really want mods for console too but I don't think we are going to get any. I already started a thread asking the same thing and I didn't get an answer. The thread actually got closed. Not much love or respect for console users on this forum, even though we payed the same price if not more for the game. 

One of the responses I got on my thread was from a modder who didn't want his mod on consoles simply because he didn't own a console. Kind of shows you what we are dealing with here.
I think KSP mods are unlikely ever to be available for PS4. The developers are having a hard enough time just creating a patch to fix the severe bugs in the released version.

I was being hopeful, since it is fairly new to the PS 4.  If they wanted to, Mods on the XBOX would be fairly  easy, since it's operating  system is based on windows. This game has a very high learning curve, and from what I have seen some of the Mods even that out.

There are no mods planned for the console editions in the near future, to the best of my knowledge.

I understand that there are certain architectural considerations that must be made, as well as the reluctance of certain vendors to have unapproved (and possibly malicious) code running on their platforms. 

Plus, distribution and troubleshooting would be a pain.

Yeah, I knew it. KSP on console is just a money grab. We get half the content at full price. Nice one. No extra work is going to go into making KSP a good and fun game to play on console like it is on PC. This game is about mods. The mods section of this forum is the most popular. There is a modding Monday. If you own a console though, too bad, you get a buggy, old, broken game, with little to no support. This game should have never released on console if they were going to treat it and us like this.

@chimpbone Sony and Microsoft aren't going to permit arbitrary DLLs on their platforms, full stop. It's not an option and likely never will be. It is not Squad's fault that this is so, there is nothing they can do to change it, and they never advertised or implied mods would be supported on the console releases.

Some people play and enjoy the stock game, even on PC. Mods are not necessary for enjoyment.
